skills.skill: Coding and Scripting (PHP, Python, Perl, Ruby)
Open Source Technologies and Cloud Services

duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, manage, and maintain tools to automate engineering operations.
Design, build, implement and support CI/CD framework.
Build highly scalable and available distributed systems on a cloud-based platform.
Own and drive initiatives to automate engineering operations and enable engineering teams to ship features following Agile methodology.
Develop, monitor, and maintain platform health and performance.
Review and strengthen the physical and logical security of the platform systems, data, and access points.
Perform deployments, upgrades, and configurations in controlled environments.
Support processes to maintain uptime, SLAs, and availability of critical platform components.
Be a member of the 24x7x365 on-call support team.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related fields (Master's preferred)
